set.seed(1)
#Generate random number and store it in a variable called data
data = runif(20,1,10)
data

#Calculate Mean
mean = mean(data)
print(mean)

#Calculate median
median = median(data)
print(median)

#Calculate a function for calculating Mode
mode <- function(x){
ux <- unique(x)
ux[which.max(tabulate(match(x, ux)))]
}
result <- mode(data)
print(data)
cat("mode= {}", result)

# Calculating Variance and std Deviation
variance = var(data)
print(variance)
standard_Deviation = sqrt(variance)
standardDeviation = sqrt(var(data))
print(standard_Deviation)
print(standardDeviation)

#Plot Histogram
hist(data, beans=10, range= c(0,10), edgecolor='black')
